overview: Quantitative image analytics and machine learning on radiologic and digital pathology images.
research_interests:
Dr. Natarajan Raghunand's research focus is on the development of clinically translatable radiologic biomarkers for the management of cancer. Collaborative clinical-translational research projects in his group include machine learning analysis of multiplexed immunofluorescence data from pre-operative biopsy tissue to predict upstaging of DCIS, deep learning to predict optimal dose maps for stereotactic radiosurgery of breast cancer metastases to the brain, prospective radiologic imaging in cancer clinical trials, and imaging biomarkers to guide adaptive therapy of recurrent high-grade glioma and metastatic Ewing sarcoma.
  *
